resources.string: You have %1$s Dash in your Uphold account. Do you want to transfer this value to this wallet?

Base amount: %1$f
Fee: %2$f
Total: %3$f

Do you want to confirm this transaction?
Fee will be deducted from requested amount.
Enter the amount to transfer below:
Your transaction was sent and the amount should appear in your wallet in a few minutes.\n\nTransaction id: %s
